Technical Details

Description
Bypass charging: Allows the device to be powered directly from the charger, bypassing the battery.

Benefits
• Thermal Mgmt: Reduces heat.
• Lifespan: Avoids charge cycles while gaming.
• Performance: More stable FPS by avoiding throttling.

Observation
• Hardware: Requires compatible PMIC and Kernel.
• Immobility: Must be connected to the cable.
• Charger: PPS protocol and min 15W recommended.
• Current: When active, around -20mA to 20mA.
• Battery: If degraded, % may drop slowly.
• Charging: When disabling Bypass, reconnect USB cable physically to restore charging flow.
